email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Busan to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Dear Alexander,

I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out to offer freight services for a shipment of 5,000 MT of steel coils from Busan to Long Beach on DAP terms. The vessel we propose is the OCEAN HARMONY, with a DWT of 85,000 and LOA of 220m. The laycan is set for April 10-15, 2024, and the initial freight quote is USD 45/MT.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Busan to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 40/MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day and the loading window?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Alexander Wang
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Busan to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Dear Alexander,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 42/MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 10,000 per day, and the loading window is 48 hours.

Please note that the laycan remains April 10-15, 2024. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Busan to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 42/MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Alexander Wang
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Busan to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Dear Alexander,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Busan on April 10, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Busan to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Alexander Wang
Global Charterers
